name: eslint-config-lucid
description: A collection of eslint plugins with settings focused on reducing cognitive load and improving readability.

scripts.preversion: npm test && npm run docs && git add --all && git diff HEAD --quiet || git commit -m "Updating docs"
scripts.clean: npm run pre-clean && npm install && npm audit fix
scripts.update: ncu -u && git diff --quiet || npm install && npm audit fix
scripts.update-clean: npm run pre-clean && npm run update
scripts.update-commit: npm run update && npm test && git add --all && git diff HEAD --quiet || git commit -m "Updating dependencies"
scripts.update-patch: npm run update && npm test && git add --all && git diff HEAD --quiet || git commit -m "Updating dependencies" && npm version patch
